name: Bosonto
description:
The Spring Has Come. Jojo the snow man found a flower on his head and realized it doesn't belong here. In this short life he is determined to deliver the flower no matter what. Watch out of those Angry Bomballs and Sunlings.

Don't miss the Boss Fight with Kuro.

Gameplay :
Run n escape or Throw Snow balls but be careful not to run out of snow, Jojo is a snowman after all.
Reach the goal before completely melting.
